ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Visit name
1. My mood often changes, from happiness to sadness, without my knowing why.
2. I have frequent ups and downs in mood, with and without apparent cause.
3. I often feel guilty without a very good reason for it.
4. My feelings are rather easily hurt.
Notes: 1 = True; 0 = False; 999 = N/A, Not Ascertainable, or missing, not answered

ElementDescription: 5. There are times when my future looks very dark.
6. Ideas run through my head so that I cannot sleep.
7. I keep in fairly uniform spirits.
8. Often I find it difficult to go to sleep because of thinking what happened during the day.
9. I often feel disgruntled.
10. I am inclined to rush from one activity to another without pausing for enough rest.
11. I am a horse for work; I am seldom exhausted.
12. I am the kind of person who is "on the go" all the time.
13. I am able to work unusually long hours without feeling tired.
14. I am often so much on the go that sooner or later I wear myself out.
15. I am quick in my actions.
16. I am happiest when I get involved in some project that calls for rapid action.
17. I have experienced periods so full of pep that sleep didn't seem to be necessary for days at a time.
18. I daydream a great deal.
19. I like to indulge in a reverie (daydreaming).
20. I daydream very little.
21. I frequently find myself in a meditative state.
22. I am inclined to think about myself much of the time.
23. My daydreams are frequently about things that can never come true.
24. It is hard for me to ask someone for a favor.
25. When I meet new people, I am afraid I won't do the right thing.
26. I feel that I never really get all that I need from people.
27. I don't like to buy clothes for myself.
28. I would rather stay free of involvements with others than risk disappointments.
29. While in trains, buses, etc, I often talk to strangers.
30. Hope only brings disappointment.
31. I am inclined to be shy in the presence of the opposite sex.
Factor 1. Mood Liability
Factor 2. Energy-Activity
Factor 3. Daydreaming
Factor 4. Social Anxiety
Bipolar II Summary Score
